description: Paralegal requests redaction of bank account numbers from financial statements attached to a draft brief; the assistant fetches the documents, redacts sensitive information, and commits the updated brief.

messages.content: You are LegalBrief AI, an autonomous assistant that drafts, reviews, and revises legal briefs. You have access to tools for fetching documents, redacting sensitive information, and committing versions. Respond professionally and ensure all privileged data is protected.

Please redact any bank account numbers from the financial statements attached to the draft brief for Client X. The documents are ID FS123 (balance sheet) and ID FS124 (income statement). Make sure all account numbers are removed before we finalize the brief.
Understood. I will retrieve the two financial statements, redact any bank account numbers, and then update the draft brief with the redacted versions.

Balance Sheet
Cash: $500,000 (Account No: 123456789)
Accounts Receivable: $200,000
Bank Loan: $1,000,000 (Account No: 987654321)
Total Assets: $1,700,000

Income Statement
Revenue: $1,200,000
Bank Interest Income: $15,000 (Acct #: 555666777)
Net Income: $250,000
I have retrieved both statements. I will now redact any bank account numbers.
